nodes.text: Carmilla Vandangante was a Human female who was the Deputy Viceprex of the Rigahuerr Publishing Combine and a native of Coruscant. She was widowed, and luxuriously doted on her only son, Klaus Vandangante.
Vandangante's first name is the same as the alias used by the vampire in Sheridan le Fanu's Gothic novel Carmilla.
